comments: This contract was competitively sourced.The Canada Gazette, as a priority service of PWGSC, has an increased workload due to several factors such as, but not limited to, the integration of specialized tools and the modernization exercise of its website. Yet the CGD continues to need and to maintain custom tools within its main publishing application. This task requires strong skills in scripting languages such as JavaScript, VBScript or Adobe Extend Script for InDesign and , HTML5, XHTML, XML, PDF, W3C, and Canada government web and accessibility standards. As such a competitive process was used to provide the services of an Advanced Computer Applications Support Specialist.
